diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $TS$ is $12+x$ units.
The length of the line $RS$ is $4x-4$ units.
The length of the line $TR$ is $3x+3$ units.
The length of the line $RS$ is equal to the length of the line $TR$.
line_instances: There are lines $TR$, $TS$, $RS$, forming a triangle $TRS$.
